Speak with a Doctor

FAQs

How do I come on board OgaDoc?

Sign up on www.ogadoc.com for free, and start consulting our doctors on the web on mobile app

Does OgaDoc have an app I can download?

Yes, ‘ContinuousCare’ is the name of the app, its usage is free. Its available on App Store and Play Store

Is consultation on OgaDoc free?

Consultation on ogaDoc is free if you are enrolled under a partner Health Maintenance Organization (HMO) or you subscribe to any of OgaDoc’s Health Plans.

Can I sign up directly on the mobile app?

No, you have to sign up on the web (www.ogadoc) first, then use your credentials to login on the mobile app

Is it secure?

Yes, all data is stored only in the servers of our technology vendor on the highly secure Amazon Web Service platform (which is compliant with HIPAA regulations).

Does OgaDoc attend to emergency cases?

No, we advise our registered patients to visit the nearest health facility for any emergency case.

What is the response time on OgaDoc?

Our doctors attend to all text consultations within 24 hours. Video consultations are attended to as fixed in the appointment calendar.

For how long does one session of audio/video consultation last?

20 minutes, but can be extended if need be

Can I open a family account on OgaDoc?

Yes, you can open additional accounts for family members especially minors under your own account.

How do I make payment?

We have a third-party payment gateway that makes payment for medical consultation seamless.

Mobile App for your Convenience

You can also stay connected with our healthcare providers and access our online healthcare services, using the free ContinuousCare App

OgaDoc is your one-stop virtual clinic, set up to attend to your health issues or concerns on-the-go.
